long_description: at the clumber inn we pride ourselves in delivering a great customer experience to everyone who calls in - including dogs! a truly local pub at the heart of a great community! all sports action from sky & bt sports can be seen on the big screen in the front bar. we also have a private lounge available for private events which is free to hire and a fantastic marquee which can be dressed for any event.
